name: The Museum Visitor
type: Game written in JavaScript and HTML5 (Canvas)
description: The Museum Visitor is a snake-like game in which you must check out art pieces without getting caught.
comments: Best practices with DOM manipulation, Canvas, functions and classes in JS. Deployment on GitHub Pages.

name: PlantApp
description: PlantApp makes it easier to take care of your personal garden and set automatic reminders to water each plant.
comments: Best practices with CRUD basic operations, cookies management, session creation and authentication. Deployment on Heroku.
credits: Developed together with Eric Company, as the backend project in our Full Stack Web Development Bootcamp at Ironhack.

name: PSC Pet Social Club
description: PSC is an application in which users and their pets connect with pet sitters on customized time windows.
comments: Best practices with CRUD operations, REST API, cookies, session and authentication. Mobile first responsive. Deployment on Heroku and Netlify.
credits: Developed together with Wenyi LU and Sebastian Marambio, as the final project in our Full Stack Web Development Bootcamp at Ironhack.
